snippet: As nearly 200 nations convene in Paris to fight climate change, Representative Lamar Smith continues to dispute climate science itself.
abstract: Rep Lamar Smith, chairman of House Committee on Science, Space and Technology, has accused federal researchers at National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration of manipulating their research to help what he calls Obama administration's climate agenda; has taken issue with paper published by NOAA scientists that finds so-called hiatus in global warming did not occur.
lead_paragraph: As nearly 200 nations convene in Paris to fight climate change, Representative Lamar Smith continues to dispute climate science itself.
